item.title: 香港大湾航空公司首席执行官计划四月卸任
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港航空公司大湾航空有限公司首席执行官许仕仁（Stanley Hui）正准备下台。【原文：Hong Kong carrier Greater Bay Airlines Co.’s Chief Executive Officer Stanley Hui is preparing to step down, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据称韦丹塔旗下 Sterlite 公司将向 GIC 风险投资公司转让三个电力项目
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，矿业公司韦丹塔有限公司（Vedanta Ltd.）旗下的私营企业 Sterlite Power Transmission Ltd. 已将三个印度输电项目转入其与新加坡主权财富基金新加坡政府投资公司（GIC Pte）的合资企业。【原文：Sterlite Power Transmission Ltd., a privately-held unit of mining company Vedanta Ltd., has transferred three Indian power transmission projects into its joint venture with Singaporean sovereign wealth fund GIC Pte, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: Hipgnosis Songs 因会计错误削减投资组合价值
item.description: Hipgnosis 歌曲基金（Hipgnosis Songs Fund）在正在进行的战略审查中发现了一个会计错误，因此将其歌曲投资组合的每股价值进一步削减了 7.6%。【原文：Hipgnosis Songs Fund has further cut the value of its song portfolio by 7.6% per share after discovering an accounting error during an ongoing strategic review.】

item.title: 凯雷接近就 15 亿欧元的蒂森船舶交易进行高级谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Private equity firm Carlyle Group Inc. is preparing to enter advanced negotiations to acquire a majority stake in Thyssenkrupp AG’s naval shipbuilding unit in a deal that could value the business at about €1.5 billion ($1.6 billion) including debt, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 可可价格从 2024 年开始翻番，延续历史性涨势
item.description: 可可期货在不到三个月的时间里翻了一番，具有里程碑意义的价格上涨愈演愈烈，增加了消费者的甜食成本，并使巧克力制造商四处寻找供应。【原文：Cocoa futures have doubled in less than three months as a landmark price run-up intensifies, boosting sweet costs for consumers and sending chocolate makers scouring for supply.】

item.title: 维德贾贾家族财团为矿山交易寻求私人信贷
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由黄金能源与资源私人有限公司（Golden Energy and Resources Pte Ltd.）牵头的一个财团正在向私人信贷基金和银行打探消息，以了解它们是否有兴趣为其斥资 16.5 亿美元收购澳大利亚的一个煤矿提供融资。【原文：A consortium led by Golden Energy and Resources Pte Ltd. is sounding out private credit funds and banks to gauge interest in financing its $1.65 billion acquisition of a coal mine in Australia, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 克普勒称中国 3 月俄罗斯石油进口量将创历史新高
item.description: 据 Kpler 称，中国本月将进口创纪录数量的俄罗斯原油，这主要得益于印度因担心美国制裁而避开的大量索科尔石油。【原文：China is on track to import a record amount of Russian crude this month, bolstered by large volumes of Sokol oil which have been shunned by India due to concerns over US sanctions, according to Kpler.】

item.title: 纳斯达克称正在调查连接问题
item.description: 纳斯达克股票市场表示正在调查连接问题，但没有提供交易是否受到影响的详细信息。【原文：The Nasdaq Stock Market said it was investigating issues with connectivity, without providing details on whether trading was impacted.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称印度无法与中国过去 8-10% 的增长率相提并论
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）首席亚洲经济学家表示，尽管该投资银行对这个南亚国家的前景仍持乐观态度，但从长期来看，印度不太可能像中国那样实现 8%-10%的经济增长率。【原文：India is unlikely to achieve the 8%-10% economic growth rates that China pulled off over the long term, Morgan Stanley’s chief Asia economist said, even though the investment bank remains optimistic about the South Asian nation’s prospects.】

item.title: 关注全球能源供应，欧洲天然气延续涨势
item.description: 由于交易商关注全球能源供应的脆弱性，欧洲天然气价格连续第四天扩大涨幅，创下自1月底以来的最长连涨纪录。【原文：European natural gas prices extended gains for a fourth day, the longest streak since the end of January, as traders focus on the fragility of global energy supplies.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊称收益率接近股票的关键水平
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）策略师表示，债券收益率正接近一个关键水平，有可能扰乱股市的涨势。【原文：Bond yields are approaching a key level that could potentially disrupt the equities rally, according to Morgan Stanley strategists.】

item.title: 韩国采取更多措施降低食品通胀
item.description: 韩国将注资 1,500 亿韩元（1.12 亿美元）并削减水果关税，以帮助控制价格压力，因为食品通胀有可能在下月议会选举前削弱公众对总统尹锡烈的支持。【原文：South Korea will inject 150 billion won ($112 million) and cut tariffs for fruits to help rein in price pressure, as food inflation threatens to dent public support for President Yoon Suk Yeol ahead of parliamentary elections next month.】

item.title: 台湾散户投资者对 ETF 的狂热推动销售额创下新高
item.description: 台湾股市创纪录的涨势正吸引散户投资者扎堆购买交易所交易基金，而当地监管机构则加强了对这种羊群行为的警告。【原文：A record rally in Taiwan stocks is luring retail investors to pile into exchange-traded funds, as local regulators stepped up warnings on the herding behavior.】

item.title: 投资者等待央行会议，欧洲股市保持稳定
item.description: 在投资者为本周晚些时候美国联邦储备委员会和英格兰银行的利率决定做好准备之际，欧洲股市在创纪录水平附近徘徊。【原文：European stocks are hovering near record levels as investors get ready for the US Federal Reserve and Bank of England interest rates decisions later this week.】

item.title: 辉瑞计划出售约 20 亿英镑的 Haleon 股份
item.description: 辉瑞公司计划出售约 20 亿英镑（25 亿美元）的 Haleon Plc 股份，这是这家英国消费者保健公司的最大股东出售其 32% 股份的第一步。【原文：Pfizer Inc. plans to sell about £2 billion ($2.5 billion) of shares in Haleon Plc, the first step by the UK consumer health company’s biggest shareholder in selling down its 32% stake.】

item.title: Vingroup 据称将出售 Vincom 零售部门 41.5% 的股份
item.description: 越南最著名的私营企业集团 Vingroup JSC 同意出售其在 Vincom Retail 公司 41.5% 的股份。【原文：Vietnam’s most prominent private conglomerate Vingroup JSC agreed to sell a 41.5% stake in Vincom Retail, according to a person who is familiar with the deal.】

item.title: 亚航加强扩张，5 月起开通柬埔寨航班
item.description: 亚航柬埔寨分公司开始销售国内航班机票，这家廉价航空公司正努力向整个地区扩张，并利用旅游需求的复苏。【原文：AirAsia’s Cambodia unit kicked off ticket sales for domestic flights as the budget carrier seeks to expand across the region and tap into a resurgence in travel demand.】

item.title: 全球大宗商品交易利润突破 1000 亿美元，创历史第二好成绩
item.description: 大宗商品交易行业在利润方面取得了有史以来第二好的成绩，银行存款超过 1 000 亿美元，积累了大量现金用于资产投资和开拓新市场。【原文：The commodity trading industry reaped its second-best year ever in terms of profits, banking over $100 billion and building up a mountain of cash to spend on assets and breaking into new markets.】

item.description: 去年，随着政府推动加强香港作为亚洲财富中心的地位，香港有 2700 多家单一家族办公室。【原文：Hong Kong had more than 2,700 single-family offices based in the city last year, following the government’s push to bolster its status as an Asian wealth hub.】

item.description: 由于这个南亚国家历史上的政策失误给国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）新救助计划的谈判蒙上了一层阴影，债券经理们在经历了今年近25%的反弹后，正在减少对巴基斯坦债务的投资。【原文：Bond managers are reducing their exposure to Pakistan’s debt after a rally of almost 25% this year, as the South Asian nation’s history of policy slippage cast a cloud over negotiations for a new International Monetary Fund bailout program.】

item.title: 调查显示，瑞士联合银行将于 6 月开始降息
item.description: 彭博社对经济学家的调查显示，瑞士国家银行开始降息的时间将早于此前的预测。【原文：The Swiss National Bank will start lowering interest rates sooner than previously predicted, according to a Bloomberg survey of economists.】

item.title: 调查显示德国因第一季度经济下滑而陷入衰退
item.description: 彭博社的一项调查显示，德国正处于经济衰退之中，今年的经济几乎不会增长。【原文：Germany is in recession and its economy will hardly grow this year, according to a Bloomberg survey.】

item.title: 日本负利率的终结意味着什么？
item.description: 人们普遍预计日本央行将结束负利率制度，这是世界上最后一个负利率制度。采取这一措施的目的是鼓励银行借贷、刺激需求和推动通胀。现在，该计划的使命已接近尾声，因为强劲的工资增长似乎使日本央行的通胀目标近在眼前。政策转变的影响将因经济和金融市场而异，一些人将从中受益，另一些人则将面临挑战。【原文：The Bank of Japan is widely expected to end its negative interest rate regime, the world’s last. The measure was adopted to encourage bank lending, spur demand and nurture inflation. Now the program’s mission is nearing an end as strong wage gains appear to bring the BOJ’s inflation goal into sight. The impact of the policy shift will vary across the economy and financial markets, benefiting some and creating challenges for others — or in some cases both.】

item.title: 中国煤炭产量自中国政府下令增加以来首次下降
item.description: 中国的动力煤产量多年来首次出现下降，更有迹象表明，中国政府通过挖掘更多燃料来加强能源安全的长期努力可能已经达到了顶点。【原文：China’s output of thermal coal has fallen for the first time in years, adding to signs that Beijing’s long campaign to bolster energy security by digging more of the fuel may have reached its apex.】

item.title: 节假日需求旺盛，中国年初石油加工量创历史新高
item.description: 今年年初，中国的原油加工量创下历史新高，因为炼油厂加大了运营力度，以满足节日需求。【原文：China processed a record amount of crude at the start of the year as refiners ramped up operations to meet holiday demand.】
